meanings.definition: A collection of beliefs or practices mistakenly regarded as being based on scientific method.
meanings.sent1: Many people are drawn to pseudosciences because they seem like real science.
meanings.sent2: Some individuals fall for pseudosciences due to their misleading appearance of scientific validity.
meanings.sent3: The pseudosciences fair at the carnival claimed to predict the future with crystal balls.
meanings.sent4: His obsession with pseudosciences was like chasing shadows in the dark.
meanings.sent5: The concept of pseudosciences can be as confusing as trying to catch a ghost.

meanings.definition: The study or practice of things that are falsely claimed to be scientific.
meanings.sent1: She dedicated her life to exposing the frauds behind pseudosciences.
meanings.sent2: Pseudosciences often rely on unproven theories and false claims.
meanings.sent3: The pseudosciences conference turned out to be a gathering of charlatans.
meanings.sent4: His belief in pseudosciences was like believing in magic spells.
meanings.sent5: The allure of pseudosciences can be as tempting as a mirage in the desert.
